sentences.sContent: Companies have been stymied by the length of time it takes to reach an agreement.
sentences.sCn: 数个公司因耗费很长时间以达成协议而受到阻碍。

remMethod.val: “十袋米” → 为了十袋米从中作梗 → 从中作梗

words.tran: 妨碍球；困难的境地（等于stymie）

trans.tranCn: 从中作梗， 完全妨碍
trans.tranOther: If you are stymied by something, you find it very difficult to take action or to continue what you are doing
